text: Hugo Arana (July 23, 1943 - October 11, 2020) was an Argentine actor and comedian. He was born in Monte Grande, Argentina. His career began in 1970. His best known roles were in El Santo de la Espada, The Truce and Los exitosos Pells. Arana died at a Buenos Aires hospital from COVID-19 on October 11, 2020 at the age of 77.Muri√≥ por coronavirus el querido y talentoso actor Hugo Arana ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Buenos Aires Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Argentine comedians Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
